name: Insurgency Runner
description:
Into the desert, in a remote city captured by the rebels, one very brave soldier runs for her life. Abandoned infantry fighting vehicles, blocked roads and other obstacles, and, of course, the evil insurgents, preventing her from reaching her goal.

Insurgency Runner - 3D runner with shooter elements in which you play as a soldier running along the road, jumping over different obstacles, collecting ammo and other bonuses, and killing rebels,. Don't get into their sightlines or you will be shot.

Game features:
- Difficulty
- Non-ordinary gameplay
- Animations
